Package marauroa.server.net.flood

Class FloodMeasure

java.lang.Object
marauroa.server.net.flood.FloodMeasure
public class FloodMeasure extends Object
Stores for each player the amount of messages and bytes sent since the last timestamp.
Author:
miguel
